Unscramble the words. Recall some of the
questions we asked about Flavia's
jack-o'-lantern.

Remember Andreia celebrated Halloween.

Here's a final challenge. Listen to
another story,
a true story. When I'm done, try to retell it.

When I was a girl, we had a cat. The cat
liked to hunt.

It usually caught small animals. One day
the cat chased a squirrel

into the house. I jumped on a chair and
screamed.

One of my brothers and his friend used
hockey sticks to get the squirrel

out of the house. I think I screamed the
whole time.

How well did you understand? Read the
story once
and then go back and listen again.

Stories are fun to tell and retell.
Practice often

and you'll get better. That's all for now.
